name: Goongeon (Metroidvania Month Jam #19)
description:
CONTROLS:

  • Left/Right: movement of the player.
  • Up: Save game, talk, eat dead bodies, look up (while holding)
  • Down: Look down (while holding)
  • C : Jump
  • X: Dash
  • V: Attack
  • M: Map
  • Esc: Menu

You are a slime, the most underrated creature of the underground. However you can become the most feared creature. Metroidvania Month Jam 19: https://itch.io/jam/metroidvania-month-19/rate/1970372

The controls are switchable. Compatible with joypad.

Developed with Godot 4 stable. Tested with Chrome

Programmed by DavidKBD and jonnydrumz

Art and design by truemushy  

Level design by jonnydrumz

Music by DavidKBD

Sound effects from Pixabay

  • https://www.davidkbd.com/
  • https://jonnydrumz.itch.io/
  • https://www.artstation.com/mushy
